docs.title: A Complete Interactive Learning Environment for University Physics with Calculus
docs.text: ## 🚀 **Welcome to the Course!**  This site is your **1-stop learning platform** for everything you need in *University Physics with Calculus*:  - 📚 Full lesson modules   - 🎥 (optional) video walkthroughs   - 🧮 Worked examples   - 🔍 Concept breakdowns   - 📝 Practice problems   - 🧠 Exam reviews   - 🧩 Interactive simulations    Whether you’re catching up after missing class   or reviewing to prepare for an exam—   **you’re in the right place.**  ---  ## 🌟 **Start Learning**  [➡️ Begin Week 1 – Kinematics](week1/index.md){ .md-button .md-button--primary }  [📘 View Syllabus](syllabus.md){ .md-button }

docs.title: ⚡ What You’ll Learn in This Course
docs.text: This course helps you master the foundations of physics using the power of calculus.

docs.title: 🔢 Kinematics
docs.text:
• Motion in 1D & 2D
  • Derivatives & integrals in motion
  • Projectile motion
  • Velocity/acceleration analysis

docs.title: ⚖️ Dynamics
docs.text:
• Newton’s Laws
  • Free-body diagrams
  • Friction, tension, normal force
  • Circular motion forces

docs.title: 🧭 Quick Navigation
docs.text:
Use the sidebar for full navigation, or jump directly:

  • Week 1 – Kinematics
  • Week 2 – Vectors & 2D Motion
  • Week 3 – Dynamics
  • Week 4 – Energy
  • Week 5 – Momentum
  • Week 6 – Rotation
  • Week 7 – SHM & Gravitation
  • Week 8 – Thermodynamics

docs.title: 🧮 Equation Help
docs.text:
This site supports full LaTeX. Example:

\[ F = ma \]

docs.title: 🔍 Search Anything
docs.text: Use the search bar in the top-right to instantly find formulas, definitions, and examples.

docs.title: 💬 Need Help?
docs.text:
Bring questions to class or email your instructor at: 📧 andy.beane@lepapps.org

# 🎉 **Let’s Get Started!** Physics is the study of the universe. Let’s explore it — one equation at a time. [➡️ Start Learning](week1/index.md){ .md-button .md-button--primary }
